questions.question: I am a student how to have a successful interection with my teacher?
questions.answer:
To have a successful interaction with your teacher, you can learn more about effective communication strategies by visiting the following link: https://moodle.hm.edu/course/view.php?id=20195#coursecontentcollapse2

Wie können Sie eine erfolgreiche Interaktion mit Ihren Lehrern gestalten, um effektiv zu kommunizieren?
